1.content:
Once again welcome aboard the S.S. Fattening of the Seas before we get things started we just need to know, who are you?

Felicia
Twenty-two years old, five foot and five inches tall, weighing at 132 pounds, curly brown hair, Italian, and petite frame. Ever since she was little she's had body image issues and trouble relating to others. A recent college dropout she came on this cruise either to find a new outlook on life or just as an escape from the rampant disappointment of others.

Caroline
Half Spanish, five foot two inches tall, twenty years old, 108lbs, short brown hair and tan skin. In every instance she could remember, Caroline was always referred to as the short one. Always the meek one. The cute one. The one who they always underestimate. The one others would hold up in photos cause she was so small. Caroline booked this cruise to take full use of the food on board. She thinks a little weight gain could give her the change she's looking for.

Riley
Pale skin with long red hair, nineteen years old, five foot eight inches tall, round hips with a big butt, and 117lbs. Riley is a total party girl through and through. Whether it's a party at 4am or your nephews birthday party, she'll be sure to show up uninvited or not. Her hopes of this cruise ship is to be the center of the ultimate party or at least get decently drunk every night.

Mikala
Six foot one inches tall, curly long black hair, half Asian, half Indian, skinny with above average assets. Mikala booked the cruise through crooked reasons: blackmail. On this cruise she expects to either achieve a modeling deal or at the very least find a sugar daddy to buy all the fancy jewelry she wants. Mikala shows signs of being manipulative and cunning, but can often times act like an air headed ditz.

She vividly remembers receiving a letter in the mail stating that she had won the sweepstakes to be one of the first people to sail aboard the S.S. But, after having thoughts of showing off her body in a bikini, soaking up sun rays, and having a drink or five. It didn't sound like she should wait to take the offer.

Felisha doesn't even remember entering a sweepstakes, but after a few bad days at home she was ready to irrationally embark on what was possibly a vacation she'll never forget.

Upon entering the ship, she loved how everything had an upscale lavish appearance to it. Crystal chandeliers, royal red carpets, professional painting on the wall, and of course lovely pottery and busts on 17th century stands.

Just the surroundings alone made her feel like she was living the high life. "Okay, I need something. Back there they said I need a...key card. Where would I-? Oh."

"Okay Miss, here's your room key and your all set," said the room manager handing Felisha her room key card, "Your luggage should be arriving to your room shortly, in the meantime try to enjoy one of our many activities."

Felisha smiled at the manager and headed off to find something that will occupy her time. To do what, she didn't know yet. There had to be something going on on the ship at this point, "Besides, the room isn't not be ready yet."

Nearby, Felisha could hear a tour guide explain the multitude of activities occurring on the ship at this moment, "There's no way that they have all of that already!" Out of the plethora of activities spoken, Felisha liked a choice few of those. She wanted to...

info.brief_description: These women go on a cruise that will change their weights forever.
info.description:
Welcome aboard the S.S. Fattening of the Seas! Where women from all over the world book a trip for one reason: To enjoy themselves for however long they stay. Whether it be relaxing or working on finding a change in themselves, the S.S. Fattening of the Seas is happy to provide with a bountiful amount of venues.

Yes! You heard that right! Aboard the Fattening of the Seas no guest shall ever be bored with our many entertaining venues and event.

Let’s start off with the most important part of the cruise ship: The Layout!

Floor 0

Medical Bay - Serves as intended. Also home of many expansive medications for people onboard.

Floor 3

Tasty Winnings - The casino takes up half of the entire floor and is filled with machines that either pay out in food or weight. Card games with attendants pay out the earnings after the player returns to their room.

Aztec theatre - A full service theater that provides guests with complimentary food and drink service, a wide selection of films both old and new, and the world’s most comfortable chairs. Some guests have reported having trouble leaving because the chairs are so nice! Isn’t that funny?

Presto’s Lounge and Drink Bar - Drink, relax, and listen to music. Presto’s is home to the most creative drink combinations known to man. Ranging from Buster’s Blubber Belly Bomb to Vast Vodka mix! This place is great for getting together or having new encounters.

Floor 4

Strip Mall- The strip mall aboard the ship is a massive line of shops for many sprees to occur. World Class venues like JC Penny’s and Zale’s are located her to satisfy many needs.

Cherry on top - A candy store with jaw dropping selections of the finest candy we could gather. Fine chocolates, tall milkshakes, and a huge endless selection is found here!

Floor 5

Albert’s Library - Albert’s Library is stacked with shelves full of Pulitzer Prize winning literature that will blow anyone away.

Photo gallery - A whole wall dedicated t showing guests how they first arrived on the ship. Many have boarded then unboarded surprised how much they changed.

Art exhibition - We took our time to gather the most inspiring pieces of artwork the world of Art has to offer.

Floors 1, 2, 6-13 are Staterooms

Staterooms aboard the Fattening of the Seas are always kept in prime condition. Some of the world's best interior decorators have gathered exclusively to our ship just to make the rooms both relaxing and unique as to not closely reflect lives at home.

Here you have a balcony, fully stocked fridge with snacks and alcoholic beverages, and a life vest incase something were to go wrong.

Floor 14

Glamic Outside Pool - Sun, sea, and surf. The Glamic Pool aboard the ship allows all of this. Roughly the size of two olympic pools and surrounded by beach chairs and jacuzzis, guests aboard the ship will find themselves spending plenty of time here.

WindJammer Palace Buffet - The pride and joy of the Fattening of the Seas. The Windjammer Palace Buffet is a 24/7 self serve culinary paradise. Here we cater to every culture from providing the most delectable rolls of sushi from Japan to the best received fried finger foods from America. Just about any food you can imagine is yours at the Windjammer Palace Buffet.

Youth Zone - The Youth Zone is an area dedicated to the young. However, Adults are free to enjoy the complimentary arcade, complete with top of the line, state-of-the-art arcade machines and a Virtual Reality room.

Carbonation Station - In partnership with Pepsi we can bring you an endless supply of carbonated beverages with favorites such as Dr. Pib and Mountain Dew. Nothing special or suspicious about this area so come right in!

Floor 15

The Pool and Sports Zone - Aside from the Glamic Pool located a whole floor below. The Pool and Sports zone contains a smaller pool, but many sports areas around it. In the mood for mini golf and basketball? Then come on up and enjoy the fresh sea air while getting in a little exercise! A newest addition to the sports zone is our very own Sumo Ring where guests can compete to see who’s weight trumps the opposers.

Up in the sports zone we have:

Ice Rink
Sumo Ring
Surfing
Mini Golf Course
Basketball Hoops

Plenty more venues are to be added as the story grows.
